bibl.title: Register and the Diachrony of Post-classical and Early Byzantine Greek.
bibl.note: 1. Introduction. - 2. The case of verbal periphrasis [with εἰμί] in Ancient Greek. - 3. Discussion: difficulties (and prospects) [see in part. pp. 29-31: 3.2. The papyri as a corpus]. - 4. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.

bibl.title: Revue belge de philologie et d'histoire

bibl.seg: Klaas Bentein, Register and the Diachrony of Post-classical and Early Byzantine Greek.

1. Introduction. - 2. The case of verbal periphrasis [with εἰμί] in Ancient Greek. - 3. Discussion: difficulties (and prospects) [see in part. pp. 29-31: 3.2. The papyri as a corpus]. - 4. Conclusion. - Avec résumé en anglais.
